metadata.title: CVE-2022-24106 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In Xpdf prior to 4.04, the DCT (JPEG) decoder was incorrectly allowing the'interleaved' flag to be changed after the first scan of the image, leadingto an unknown integer-related vulnerability in Stream.cc.

criterions.comment: ipe package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
emscripten package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
texlive-bin package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
